body.name: Cupocupa Queen Comforter Set Bed in A Bag 7 Pieces Comforter Queen Size Sets; Soft Vintage Lightweight Floral Comforter Set for All Season;Floral Bedding Set (Queen 7 Piece Bed in a Bag Brown)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 15 mins
features: Unique Design：The White Comforter Set uses royal style design,giving your a elegant and luxurious enjoyment .The white decorative wrinkles is simple and advanced,which is suitable for any bedroom style. You can give this soft comforter to the women around you on Mother's Day, Women's Day, and Christmas.

Materials-This Queen comforter set is made of brushed microfiber material with 220 GSM fiber cotton inner fill,fluffy and warm. Lightweight and breathable comforters keep you warm in the winter and fit to use in the summer.The premium fabric and advanced crafting technology keep our bedding sets away from pilling, wrinkling and color fading.

What You Can Get: This King Size 7-Piece bed in a bag includes everything you need for a cozy bed: - 1xQueen Comforter(88" * 88") + 2x Pillow shams( 20" * 30")+ 2x Pillow cases( 20" * 26")+ 1x Flat sheet(90" * 102")+ 1x Fitted sheet(60" * 80") .Completely transform your bare mattress into a comfortable and warm sleep paradise all year round.

Lightweight & Fluffy :The advantage of microfiber comforters being easy to wash is that they have low water absorption. When used, sweat and other substances do not adsorb on the surface. Simply air it to keep it dry and fluffy. This texture queen size bedding set is also more comfortable to use due to its lightweight .You can always keep non-slip no matter how you twist and turn in your bed.

Easy Care: With the microfiber fabric, this queen size comforter set is resistant to dirt and wrinkle.After washing the comforter set once after receiving it, you can restore it to its fluffy state. Machine wash separately in cold water, gentle cycle. Tumble dry on low heat. Iron on low heat when needed. Do not bleach.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Design Concept The design concept of the Floral Comforter Set aims to achieve a perfect blend of modernity, simplicity, and artistry. We use beautiful flowers and patterns to exude unique individuality, while emphasizing harmony and contrast in color selection. We also prioritize comfort and sustainability by choosing natural and high-quality fabrics. Overall, the printed set embodies the perfect combination of modernity, art, and comfort.

Previous page Floral Pattern & Design Comforter Set features floral print design that adds fashionable and vintage elements to your room. Fluffy Comforter Relieve fatigue and get a good night's sleep every day. Convenience Pockets Pockets in the fitted sheet can bring convenience to the bedroom. Premium Material Floral Comforter Set is made of premium lightweight microfiber and whole piece of polyester fiber. Next page 1 Floral Pattern & Design 2 Fluffy Comforter 3 Convenience Pockets 4 Premium Material

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hell of a
reviews.reviewText: Arrived quickly, very well packed without rain damage. Terrific vibrant colors as I had expected. I laundered all the items on gentle cold cycle, no fading, came out of a warm dryer without wrinkles, looks really stunning on my large sofa bed. Soft fabric, delicate, hope it holds up well as it will get daily use…it is a sofa, not just a bed. Like sleeping under a cloud. Wonderfully warm without being too hot. Sheets solid mocha, no pattern. The color is rich. Pillow covers patterned. Very happy…may order another set and sew up the quilt and the sheets into window coverings…fresh snowfall as we speak, would not only keep out the cold but look bright! Glad I sew! Very happy with this colorful set..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was so thrilled to see this same comforter set on Amazon after having a bad experience trying to get the same comforter on EBay which was shown to have been delivered but never was. Fortunately I got a refund from EBay though the seller did not communicate with me about the issue. This comforter also had complimentary sheets and pillow cases and was $20 cheaper than the same one I’d seen on EBay that never came.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Colors are very true - light weight sheets and comforter
reviews.reviewText: This is a great set of spring/summer bedding (I am in the Northeast, and this comforter alone isn't enough to keep me warm at night - but it doesn't claim to be full of down!).I generally like to stick with natural materials to be more environmentally conscientious, but this is microfiber, and for the price point, it just makes sense. The microfiber is incredibly soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the silk comforter
reviews.reviewText: It’s pretty in person just a little darker than pictures. The fitted sheet, regular sheet and pillow cases are more brown than a coral color shown

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and warm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great comforter for the money.
reviews.reviewText: The comforter matches my color scheme in my room. It looks absolutely amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Comforter was ripped
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful bedding set but I have to give 1 star because the comforter was ripped. I removed the sheets, comforter and pillow cases and all looked good. They were all vacuum packed so the comforter was super flat. I shook it out and left it to fluff up overnight. I went to spread it out and look at it this morning and realized that there's small tears in it with small bits of white stuffing coming out. 1/10 due to damage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Comforter Set
reviews.reviewText: Just received comforter set and it is Beautiful.The color is vibrant and the detail of the pattern is spot on. This is a gift so I’m thrilled to give it!
